q: He also wants to see Barack Obama take steps to reduce the deficit by closing loopholes in corporate tax laws and reducing unnecessary defense spending before considering cuts to education, health care or Social Security. I hope the president makes it clear that as we go forward in terms of deficit reduction, we don't do it on the backs of the middle class or the most vulnerable people in this country, Sen. While these politicians attack abortion coverage from every angle, they now want to deny funding for birth control, even though that's the best way to prevent unintended pregnancy, said Nancy Keenan , president of NARAL Pro-Choice America. on NBC, Colin Powell said that part of the reason he is supporting Barack Obama is because he did not like the negative tone of John McCain 's campaign, which has noted the links between Barack Obama and domestic terrorist Bill Ayers . It troubled me. We have two wars. We have economic problems, we have health problems.... Those are the problems the American people want to hear about, not about Mr. Bill Ayers , not about who's a Muslim and not a Muslim. Google Inc. . Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt . Photographer: Tony Avelar/Bloomberg Eric Schmidt said he is`` committed to Google Inc. '' and that he agrees with co-founders Sergey Brin on`` everything.'' He said he will stay at Google Inc. as long as it is exciting. Eric Schmidt spoke to reporters in Munich today. Eric Schmidt , who will be replaced as CEO by Page on April 4, said the transition will not affect decision-making at the company.
